nodes.text: Nokril was a Human male employed by the reconstituted Sith Empire to acquire resources. At some point during the Cold War he was on Nal Hutta to buy a shipment of spice from the Hutt Suudaa Nem'ro, as the Empire had discovered new medical properties of spice.
Nokril is a non-player character from the massively multi-player online role playing game Star Wars: The Old Republic released by BioWare in 2011. He is voiced by Nolan North.
